snippet: The thing that I've learned from my own personal experience of working at a struggling Baghdad trauma center is that you should cherish every single victory that you take part in making and enjoy it to the extreme, because those proud moments never...
abstract: The thing that I've learned from my own personal experience of working at a struggling Baghdad trauma center is that you should cherish every single victory that you take part in making and enjoy it to the extreme, because those proud moments never last.
